TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 1064
TEI.2.document_title: Thomas F McKinney to James F Perry, 07-17-1834

barker_notes.barker_summary: Thomas F. McKinney to James F. Perry, July 37, 1834. Efforts in behalf of Austin.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1064

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Thomas F. McKinney to James F. Perry, July 37, 1834. Efforts in behalf of Austin.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr James F. Perry*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*D Sir I have written as many letters as I think will be necessary to effect our purpose and heaven grant our labors may not be in vain I have also written one to the *person_mentioned*Col */person_mentioned*and hope they may intercept it*/p*
*p*I also write one to *person_mentioned*Duke */person_mentioned*presuming you may go there*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Thos F. McKinney */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Velasco */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="07-17-1834">17 July 1834*/date_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
